ISSUE.TITLE: No icon for the "Plugins" menu item in the admin area
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 beta On the admin menu, put an icon for "plugins". The other headers have a little icon, but not plugins ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5019111/108951013-46bee200-7678-11eb-93a6-082146262b60.png) Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/90309/find-bugs-in-nopcommerce-440-beta-and-earn-10/page/2#281369

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5659 Do not allow guests to enter news/blog comments if comments are disabled
